Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.collector

Class DocValuesCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
      • org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.collector.DocValuesCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.search.Collector, org.apache.lucene.search.LeafCollector
    public class DocValuesCollector
extends org.apache.lucene.search.SimpleCollector
    Collector to record per-segment DocIdSets and LeafReaderContexts for every segment that contains a hit. Those items can be later used to read DocValues fields and iterate over the matched DocIdSets. This collector is different from org.apache.lucene.search.CachingCollector in that the later focuses on predictable RAM usage and feeding other collectors while this collector focuses on exposing the required per-segment data structures to the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  DocValuesCollector.Docs
      Used during collection to record matching docs and then return a {@see DocIdSet} that contains them.
